name: Haeli Maas | LW815 Final | Spring 2022
description:
This project is meant to raise awareness about stigmas surrounding humanitarian relief. By navigating through each journey, you will be responsible for deciding how it goes. 

A form of “walk a mile in their shoes,” the stories here cannot even begin to reach the millions of real stories that have yet to be told. By making these decisions, you can see the kinds of things immigrants face, as well as the inequitable treatment these victims receive in the immigration system. 

Remember that the immigration system varies widely from person to person. It would be impossible to tell all of those stories, but this is meant to give a glimpse.

Final Project by Haeli Maas
